name: Information Management Technologies
tagline: The bridge between data and decisions
body:
### Welcome to the IMT Open Page
  This collection of repo organizations helps you get started in using IMT's tools and solutions.  There are eight main repositories.



  ## Tools and Use Cases


  * [Tool demonstrations](https://github.com/IMTorgDemo) 
  * [Custom solutions](https://github.com/IMTorgCustomSoln) 
  * [Interactive visualizations](https://github.com/IMTorgVisSoln) 
  



  ## Integrated and Supporting Open Tools


  * [Data engineering and analysis](https://github.com/IMTorgOpenTools)
  * [Web distribution](https://github.com/IMTorgOpenWebTools)
  



  ## Research Projects and Test Code


  * [Projects used in research](https://github.com/IMTorgRsrchProj)
  * [Test Projects](https://github.com/IMTorgTestProj)
  * [Test Code](https://github.com/IMTorgTestCode)
  


  
  

### Support or Contact
 Would you liket to learn more? Check out our [corporate site](https://mgmt-tech.org) or [contact support](information@mgmt-tech.org).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
